name: Castle In The Darkness
description: Castle In The Darkness is a fun and challenging shout out to the early days of video games! It's an action exploration platformer with some RPG elements, much like games from the Castlevania or Metroid series. It's super fast-paced, challenging, and full of secrets!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Pentium 4 or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 8 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: Any
